mapper.select: Select Case when orderid is null or '' then 0 else orderid end as last_orderid
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo (orderid, mid, pnum, oid, oquantity) values (#{orderId},#{mid},#{pnum},#{oid},#{oquantity})
mapper.select:
select c.cid, c.mid, c.pnum, c.cquantity, pr.pname, pr.pphoto, po.oid, po.oname, po.oprice ,c.cquantity*po.oprice as sum_price
from cart c join member m join product pr join poption po
where c.mid = m.mid and c.pnum = pr.pnum and po.pnum = pr.pnum and c.oid = po.oid
and m.mid = #{mid};
